message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this great product and I think you'd really appreciate it. I'm offering it to you for $95. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending within $80. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $80?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but I'm not quite able to go that low. I'm willing to drop the price to $85, considering your interest in the product. What do you say?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. I would like to propose a price of $82, if that works for you.
